/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees dot the sidewalk, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top left corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's hustle and bustle.
